1.0.name: wordpress/kims-photostream-plugin
1.0.description: Kim's Photostream Plugin is a WordPress Plugin that I wrote for my wife Kim. She wanted to have a flickr style photostream on our blog with all the images from recent posts. I found several plugins that would show the featured images from recent posts, but usually in a slideshow format.
